return msg

query:
CREATE TABLE DATA (
	"Timestamp" varchar(20),
	"DeviceID"  varchar(50),
	"Temperature" float,
	"Digital_D0" float,
        "Digital_D1" float,
	"Digital_D2" float,
	"Digital_D3" float,
	"Analog_A0" float,
	"Analog_A1" float,
	"Analog_A2" float,
	"Analog_A3" float
)

name: Temperature
func:
flow.set(msg.deviceId + '.Temp',msg.payload.d.samples);
return msg;

name: moteStore
func: flow.set('mote',msg.payload)

msg.payload = flow.get('manager')
return msg;
flow.set('mote-A0-rate',msg.payload)
flow.set('mote-D0-rate',msg.payload)
flow.set('mote-D1-rate',msg.payload)
return msg
flow.set('mote-D2-rate',msg.payload)
flow.set('mote-D3-rate',msg.payload)
return msg
flow.set('mote-A1-rate',msg.payload)
flow.set('mote-A2-rate',msg.payload)
flow.set('mote-temp-rate',msg.payload)
return msg
return msg
flow.set('mote-A3-rate',msg.payload)

name: configure here first

func: return msg;
return msg;

msg.payload = {
    'D0' : global.get(msg.deviceId+'.D0Enable'),
    'D1' : global.get(msg.deviceId+'.D1Enable'),
    'D2' : global.get(msg.deviceId+'.D2Enable'),
    'D3' : global.get(msg.deviceId+'.D3Enable'),
    'A0' : global.get(msg.deviceId+'.A0Enable'),
    'A1' : global.get(msg.deviceId+'.A1Enable'),
    'A2' : global.get(msg.deviceId+'.A2Enable'),
    'A3' : global.get(msg.deviceId+'.A3Enable'),
}
return msg;

name: numMacDropped
label: Number of packets dropped by MAC

name: numTxBad
label: Transmit failure counter for bad link

name: badLinkFrameId
label: Frame id of link with the worst performance over the last health report interval

name: badLinkSlot
label: Slot of link with the worst performance over the last health report interval

name: badLinkOffset
label: Offset of link with the worst performance over the last health report interval

name: numMotes
label: Number of motes in the Operational state

name: maxNumbHops
label: Maximum number of hops in the network * 10

name: stateTime
label: Time after last mote state modification (in s)

name: numGoodNbrs
label: No. of neighbours with good (> 50) quality paths

name: numJoins
label: Number of times this device has joined

name: packetsReceived
label: No. of packets received by the manager from mote

name: hopDepth
label: Calculated number of hops from the manager * 10

name: avgLatency
label: Average time from mote to manager (in ms)

name: numNbrs
label: No. of motes within range of this mote

name: packetsLost
label: No. of packets sent by mote, lost at manager

name: isRouting
label: Can be used as a non-leaf node in the network?
